verbose_text: Thus, in the present study we wished to determine whether gingerol inhibits the catalytic activity of PHD2 and prevents HIF-1alpha protein proteasomal degradation, thereby preventing the occurrence of PrP (106-126)-induced neuronal apoptosis.
evidence: gingerol inhibits the catalytic activity of PHD2 and prevents HIF-1alpha protein proteasomal degradation, thereby preventing the occurrence of PrP (106-126)-induced neuronal apoptosis
